description:
A simple, secure, decentralized VPN mesh network solution


This version is a BugFix version, which mainly fixes the unavailable issue of the Android version and optimizes some web consoles.
- save api host in local storage by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/523
- fix web show dup entry for same machine by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/526
- support pause a network in web by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/528
- fix android crash and vpn create problem by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/531
Full Changelog: https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/compare/v2.1.0...v2.1.1
